name: MTLCounterSampleBuffer
desc: An object containing an allocation of memory for recording counter sample data.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The device object that created the counter sample buffer.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: A string that identifies the counter sample buffer.

items.name: var sampleCount: Int
items.desc: The number of samples in the buffer.

items.name: func resolveCounterRange(Range<Int>) -> Data?
items.desc: Resolve the counters from a range of samples and copy them to memory.
